dcterms:description: A dataset of biomedical papers collected from PubMed Central (PMC) documents, containing about 21 million tokens, specifically focused on cancer-related texts.
dcterms:title: ELMo Training Set

dcterms:creator: Larry Smith
Lorraine K Tanabe

dcterms:description: The dataset for BioCreative II Gene Mention detection shared task, containing 15000 training and 5000 test sentences from PubMed abstracts with gold annotations for gene mentions.
dcterms:title: BC2GM

dcterms:creator: Jin-Dong Kim
Tomoko Ohta
Yoshimasa Tsuruoka
Yuka Tateisi
Nigel Collier
dcterms:description: The dataset for a shared task on biomedical entity detection, containing 2000 GENIA abstracts for training and 404 abstracts for testing, annotated for various entity classes.
dcterms:title: JNLPBA
